title: FS: 1890's CDV Frank Slavin boxing star

posts.post_title: FS: 1890's CDV Frank Slavin boxing star
posts.post_content:
Hi!  I have available for sale an 1890's CDV of boxing star Frank Slavin.  Yours for $79 postpaid.  Any interest?
Thanks, Andy Sandler      [url]andy@allsportsauctions.com[/url]
SOLD
